name: Swapper Tiles
description: Swapper Tiles is a First Person Puzzle game where you find yourself trapped in a cage with your only chance to escape is to complete the challenges set. The game revolves around completing puzzles by swapping tiles around to create a path between them. Demo available on website.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I3 M 380 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: It can probably run on any computer as it is very small.
